WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing since not related to the tutorial. Please post general discussion questions in the Discussions list.
WorkItem.Summary: 'Value cannot be null. Parameter name: source' when adding to cart

Comments.Message:
I'm closing this in the issues list since it's not a problem with the MVC Music Store tutorial. If you have general questions about this tutial, it's better to ask in the Discussions list, which has support for code snippets, etc. 

Since this question isn't really about MVC Music Store (you're making some changes using products, etc.) I'd recommend asking on StackOverflow, with more source for context. If you don't get an answer, post on the Discussions board with a link to the StackOverflow question, okay?
